types.name: AudioCapture
types.summary: Class for capturing an audio stream and generating colors.

types.name: MiController
types.summary:
Class for controlling a MiLight WiFi controller box. Must be instantiated by supplying the IP-address of the controller. Commands for specified groups or all lightbulbs can then be sent using the methods for RGB or white lightbulbs.

The controller must be linked to the local WiFi network and lightbulbs must first be linked to groups with the MiLight phone app.

See http://github.com/Milfje/MiControl/wiki for more information.
